A few sentences to explain what's on the map

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, fig.width=12, fig.height=8}
# Libraries
library(leaflet)

# Adresses with GPS
load("adress_with_gps.RData")

leaflet(data = data) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap, options = providerTileOptions(minZoom = 8, maxZoom = 11)) %>%
  setView( lng = 153, lat = -27.46, zoom = 10) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(~lon, ~lat, radius=7, color="orange", weight=2, opacity=1)
```
